com.web.webserver.http

Class HttpRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.web.webserver.http.HttpRequest

  • public class HttpRequest
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains all the information included in a request. Contains a static method parse(InputStream) that creates an HttpRequest by reading and parsing the data from the socket.

    • Method Detail

      • parse

        public static HttpRequest parse(java.io.InputStream inputStream)
                         throws BadRequestException,
                                ConnectionClosedException,
                                java.net.SocketTimeoutException
        This method creates a new HttpRequest with the data read form the inputStream. Will throw exceptions in case of errors.
        Parameters:
        inputStream - The stream to read from.
        Returns:
        A new instance of HttpRequest containing information from the request
        Throws:
        BadRequestException - If the request is not properly formatted
        ConnectionClosedException - If there is an error while reading data
        java.net.SocketTimeoutException - If the client does not come back with another request before Socket timout
